extendedInfo.description: It's easy to see how efficiently you're driving and how much you're saving with eco:Drive and your FIAT equipped with Blue&Me. It analyses your journeys and converts your driving information into simple, clear facts and figures, like fuel consumption, CO2 and money saved

reviews.title: Great idea, but cannot use on Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: I use Ecodrive pendrive in my 500 for more than a year, but I couldn\'t make work this app with Galaxy Nexus (4.2.1), I can only read data from previuos journeys that are already online, but not record new data, though app created its files on storage. And please make this app available worldwide. Russian and Ukrainian translations would be great.
reviews.author: Vyacheslav Mykhailov

reviews.title: Data incorrect
reviews.comment: App starts and seems to work but all the information in journey details besides the distance is incorrect. I am uk based so have a feeling that metric to imperial conversion has gone wrong. Also would be nice if fuel price could be manually entered. Sgs2 jb stock rom.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working :-(
reviews.comment: I used to find it a very useful app on my last phone, but it does not seem to be working at all on Ice Cream Sandwich... And now not on Jelly Bean either!
reviews.author: Jor Barrie

reviews.title: Needs a massive overhaul
reviews.comment: Requires you to mount phone as mass storage, and a lot of modern phones are incapable of mounting it as anything other than camera or media device.  The interface looks like it was designed to be integrated with Android 2.1.
reviews.author: Chris Phelps

reviews.title: LG G2x - Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Opens but won\'t journey or log journeys. Is it supposed to work with my blue tooth? Because it does nothing.
reviews.author: Gilbert Garcia

reviews.comment: Haven\'t been able to record data using GS3
reviews.author: Andrew Burgin

reviews.title: Can\'t do a thing!
reviews.comment: Tried to login with the same details the desktop EcoDrive uses as was told I\'m not registered! Tried to register using the app and was told email address was already in use! Used another email account to register, received the 4 digit code and completed registration. Finally logged in to the app and was told to add a car, every single car I selected I was told \"Car not available\". Absolute joke from Fiat just like the Blue&Me system!! Waste of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashing... EVERYWHERE!
reviews.comment: Stoped working on the PC. Not working on Android 4 Crashing Constantly
reviews.author: Kostas Stogias

reviews.title: Fiat developers!
reviews.comment: Although not your team please speak to the blue and me team about enabling A2DP not being able to stream music is killing my fiat experience.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too many bugs
reviews.comment: Way too many bugs to make this app enjoyable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor stability
reviews.comment: Too many bugs, awful stability and keeps rotating screen on Acer a500
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t do miles right
reviews.comment: Shows my miles in kilometres (but calls them miles). Conversions seems to be wrong, including mpg. Makes stats useless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more cars added
reviews.comment: This app would be awesome. But its only for fiat cars. I would totally use it. Sadly don\'t have a fiat. I\'d love one to be eco friendly, but don\'t have the money.
reviews.author: Daniel Bachleda

reviews.title: ***Must be updated!***
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work properly on ics, jb and tablets. The application stops itself.  ***Why don\'t you update the application?? It is related to Fiat, but no innovation or update comes yet!!! I think FIAT GROUP forgets the applications they created!!!***
reviews.author: Hasan Murat
